Hey guys! Today is a interesting day ;)
I’ve met an interesting company (startup-like) looking for a good JS developer: Qualifio.

They work with Node.js / AngularJS and more interesting, with ES6 through Babel. Thats so cool because, here in Belgium, the Node.js missions are really uncommon… Did I mention that they work Agile? #happy #developer

For those like me using CoffeeScript, here is an interesting guide to switch to ES6.

If like me you wanna learn ES6, here some interesting links to boost your rookie skill:

  • Eric Douglas Guide (best ressource)
  • Exploring ES6 Online Book
  • Interesting ES6 Playlist on YT (JSBroadcast)

I hope you’ll enjoy these ressources ;)

See you next time…
